info.name: LaTeXPlugin
info.description:
Compiles LaTeX documents and sends them as images. 
 You need to have LaTeX, dvisvgm and ImageMagick installed to make it work. 
 It automatically converts codeblocks with language 'latex' or 'tex' or you can open a popup to put your code in.

defaultConfig.name: PNG-Density
defaultConfig.note: The Density-Amount to use for converting svg to png

defaultConfig.name: Compile Codeblocks
defaultConfig.note: Whether latex and tex Codeblocks should be automatically compiled and converted

defaultConfig.name: Custom Text Color
defaultConfig.note: Only applies if no own header containing documentclass is set

defaultConfig.name: Custom Text Color
defaultConfig.note:
Whether to use the custom text color. 
 Only applies if the above checkbox is checked

defaultConfig.name: Show Background
defaultConfig.note: Whether the background should be visible (if not checked it's transparent)
